autoexposurebracketing: 2 to 3 exposures in increments of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 1 or 2 steps to (+-) 1.0 EV
exposuremeteringsystem: 3D-Color Matrix Metering II, Center-weighted, Spot metering
flashsyncmodes: Auto, Fill-in flash, Red-eye reduction, Red-eye reduction with Slow sync, Slow sync, Rear-curtain sync, Off
shuttertype: Electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter
viewfinder: Fixed eye-level pentaprism; built-in diopter adjustment (-2 to +1 m-1)
